reviews.review_text: Really good donair. The employees are friendly and funny. The inside gets hot, easier to get as take out Its conveniently by all the bars and open late if want a snack. I would recommend this place

This is by far some of the best food in Vancouver. The staff here is awesome and I have literally eaten here almost everyday some weeks. Fresh, consistent, delicious flavors, the meat is never dry and the portions are extremely generous. I always recommend!!!!

This is literally the best donair in town. I keep telling myself this is impossible But its true. Even my kiddo who doesnt care about veggies inhales the Veggie loaded chicken donair. Really good baklava too. But that chicken donair is amazing. The best in fact.
Delicious experience, falafel scooped and fried fresh to order. Portions were very generous, chicken plate was so tasty. 10/10 recommend!!!

So damn good. Ordered a lamb donair wrap; the flavours and veggies were perfect. Ive eaten a lot of shawarma and donair across Canada and this was one of the best ones Ive ever had. Prices are good as well. Will definitely be returning!

Great little spot for Mediterranean food. Place was renovated and looks great inside. Forgot to take pictures of the decor. Next visit. We usually order the Chicken and Lamb plates and 2 orders of their Hawaiian Donair. They add pinnapples to their regular donairs. You have to ask because its not on the menu. My sons love the donair. Great foods and good prices, you wont be disappointed. One of our go too spots. Its unfortunate that theyre only in downtown  Vancouver because were in East Vancouver.

Best donair in van! I have gone here for years and it is always 10/10. I m always impressed with the amount of food given, amazing value. Late night might look busy/ congested but it is 100000% worth any sort of wait. I know these guys are close to a different popular donair chain  do yourself a favour and go here instead.
Ive tried all of the other spots, this one has the best donair in the city. The staff is dope, and they serve quick. My go-to spot

Delicious halal lamb shank and beef donair! The prices are great too. The chef/ sales person was very friendly. The place has about 5 bar stools and 4 or 5 tables that seat 2 each. I will definitely go again.
I love this place. There Donairs are the best donairs I ever tried specially the chicken and the sauces. I really like the customer service too:)

The food is amazing and such great value. My favorite is the mix plate of chicken and falafel. The staff are very friendly, and always make sure to give you a nice big portion of meat, they dont skimp on anything! The sauces are awesome too. Highly recommend this place.

If you are a Donair lover definitely stop by this place. I ordered a checkin Donair  and a chicken plate it was delicious with lots of salad and sauces on it. Of course the staff was so friendly and professional.
Amazing donair. Fresh ingredients. Fast and efficient service. Will return 10/10
Very tasty food and great service! :)
The best place in vancouver. They were closed for a month for renovation but they are back with the same amazing food and the staff is so friendly. Must try for the people who have not visited yet.
The food is literally on top!! It tastes really good,the staff are extremely friendly and helpful the restaurant is always I would definitely recommend !!

If you you are a bonafide donair lover...be sure to make this stop. Crazy good: sauces, meat, portions, and toppings. Normally I would get the lamb or the beef (and Im sure they would be great) but the guy behind the counter said the chicken was the most popular...and then a customer piped in and demanded I get the chicken. I complied and dont regret it...amazing!

Nothing can beat the tastes of Mr geek donair They are best of best, yes I can say that cause I have tried every donair in this city. The shop is small they work on sitting arrangements better 100* for food Food : 5/5
Consistently good donair! The chicken plate with tabouli is my go to.
Absolutely incredible. Consistency is the key and these guys have it down. Thank you for being open so late and serving the most amazing and delicious shawarma every time.

The BEST in the city! The freshest, from scratch ingredients. Unlike other donair places that do weird menu items and novelty fried foods for the Granville crowd, this place does real deal plates, donairs, salads and falafel (made to order!) soo well! Friendly staff too
Great donair plate. It made me miss the days in Europe.
Newly renovated.  Chicken rice used to be $9.50, now it is $12. No more super size Donair.  Just one size Donair.  Chicken is still as tasty and the best one.
Kebabs are excellent. Meal pack is very good, but Id suggest just get another kebab.
To me its all about the chicken shwarma plate. Hands down a must visit when Im in Vancouver.
Chicken shawarma plate - amazing. Pasta salad - bomb. Baklava - so God damn good. I literally walk passed at least 7 shawarma shops on my way to this gem.

The best donair and shawarma plate in Vancouver, maybe the world. Dont let the exterior fool you, nor the superior signage of Donair Dude or Babylon Cafe, Mr. Greek is thee best for both value and taste. I insist you try the pasta salad if you go. Tell them Adam sent you.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Adam, means the world !

reviews.review_text: Love these hole in the wall places. Amazing food. Let them build it for you. Loaded Donairs with slice. They are great. Highly recommend. Good price too.

I walked into the restaurant while the employee was helping out another customer. He asked  for here or to go,  and I let him know  to go please.  Then he said  I wasn t talking to you dude!  5/5 stars. Also, one Donair was MUCH more filling than we thought, and I m a pretty big dude. So very happy with the portion size.

Ive been coming here for years on a biweekly basis. They consistently make the BEST shawarma Ive ever had anywhere in the world. Flavor, freshness, price, portion size and filling are always 5 stars. This is for sure the best shawarma place in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words !

reviews.review_text: Great place to get a quick bite. Love the food and professional stuff. Great spot for middle eastren food in downtown core.
I get the chicken donair from here when Im at work. They taste very good and the portions are good too. Their sauces compliment the meat and veggies well.
I have tried differents donairs, and no ones taste as good as this, Mr Greek has the best donairs in DT Vancouver.
Beef gyro with salad.  Appreciated the variety of salads.  Service was excellent... very nice person.. efficient!  Will go back for sure.

My favourite place to go for filling food with fast service. The people here are so generous and always load up your plate. You ll never come to Donair Town and still be hungry after (assuming you get a plate instead of a wrap).
Unbelievable! I always get the bowls and today tried their lamb shank for 17$!!! And it was so so good! This definitely isn t a pit stop for drunk food

The most delicious and filling donair I have ever had. Lots of meat and veggies for such a great price. Staff was kind and friendly. Will definitely be visiting again. New favorite spot to get my donair fix.
Really amazing food and not too expensive
So good! Thanks guys. Food was amazing. Also what do people expect from a donair place? Top-notch fine dining? Some of These reviews!

Best donair in town easily. And amazing price. Great service. I installed sprinklers from north vancouver to surrey and chilliwack and the best donair you can buy is here. The sauce is fire, the tabouli is fresh, falafels are fresh. Only possible constructive criticism is for a spicier hot sauce. Much love going out to this place for serving until 4am <3<3<3<3<3<3<3< -the wasted white guy

I was in Canada a month ago and visited this place, ever since I fantasized with their delicious donairs, Im so sad I havent find anything similar here in Mexico :( if someone can tell me the ingredients it will be amazing so I can try to make my own at home, since it was my first time trying a donair, I just requested it with all the ingredients, but I never really knew what were those fillings Ohhh, and I loved how spicy it was     just want to go back to Canada to est these donairs again!

Ordered the Beef Donair and it was positively divine bovine and very fresh ingredients with many options. Would also highly recommend thier Falafel. Id give this epic diner 10   if I could. Please go sample the delight you wont be dissatisfied.

Easily the best Donair in Vancouver, super friendly staff, tasty all time time, very generous portions (especially once you get get to know the people working there, they hook up) and best of all? They charge the least amount of the Vancouver Donair places while still being the best! Cant recommend enough, Im not over-exaggerating when I say this place deserve 5 stars. I tip every time.

Phenomenal donair spot in downtown Vancouver. Dont let the look of this place (for mostly the wrong reasons) fool you, the food is stellar. Took my coworkers weeks to convince me to come because of the appearance and location on Granville near Davie Street. But boy was I pleasantly surprised. Amazing chicken and sauces that accompany the wraps and plates. Sadly havent tried the lamb or beef but definitely look great as well. Staff are decently friendly but you arent coming here for anything but the food. Thankfully its open until 3am daily as well.
Chicken plate was great - the shawarma, rice and sauces were a perfect mix. Nice and light to eat as well

After having tried a few donair stores on Granville street, I can easily say this one has the best chicken shawarma Ive ever tried. The chicken is so damn tasty and all the ingredients look so fresh, I really advise you to try it, with that price ($7,50) you really cant go wrong!

Its a small local shop to get cheap bite in the downtown. Food is authentic and the staff is helpful and fun. Try out various samosa and baklavas they have in store. The seating space is not too much so I prefer to order takeaways. Ask staff to make it spicy if you want your food to be so.
Friendly staff, great wraps full of good creamy sauce and tangy pickles. Had the falafel and chicken/lamb mixed donair.
Tried their shawarma plate and falafel plate, both were authentic in taste and the portions were generous. Quick service. Halal.

One of our favorite food places on Granville. The lamb shank is amazing and is perfectly matched with their dill rice. They carry some vegetarian options as well as well as some delicious desserts, if you still have room for it. The place is rather small with just a few tables, and if your looking for bite to go, you got the right place.
Hands down one of the best donair spots i ve been to! Strongly recommend and highly suggest !!!
So tasty! I recommend this place for anyone who is hungry for real food that wont break the bank. Probably my favorite place to grab food when Im on Granville
Amazing food. Fresh ingredients and nicely grilled meat. Big portion and nice price. Im a big eater and i barely finished the wrap. Highly recommend if you are a donair lover.
Doesn t matter the time Donair Town always delivered the freshest chicken plate in DT Vancouver. Highly recommend.
This is my go to place. Enriched flavour and filling, this place is where I walk in whenever I am nearby.
Super tasty food and generous portions! Would highly recommend getting the mix plate (falafel and chicken), probably the most delicious meal I ate while visiting Vancouver!

Holy! Knocked entirely out of the park, was busy so I know something was going on. Another gentleman came out to help take orders and he was super kind, the portion size was perfect, the meat to veggie+sauce ratio was perfect and the hot sauce was just right. Also offers cherry and vanilla coke, 6/5 is attainable.

HOLY #*&! This place is good! I barely remember a place where I have been so pleasantly surprised with the food. Like yea i expected it to be good but HOLY MAN when I took a bite It was the most amazing blends of tastes and I just wasnt expecting such greatness. Id give this place 10 stars if I could. Come here. bring friends, Enjoy.
The meat is so good here!

Look no further, Mr Greek Donair Town is the best bang for the buck! $6 for a chicken/beef donair, or $11 for a platter. Javi and his family have been serving top quality, fresh food every single day since I first tried them in 2007! This is my go to place when I am dining alone after the gym or getting a quick bite before work, or stopping in after clubbing.

Went yesterday and got the chicken shawarma and vine leafs. I must say best tasting donair chicken ive ever had and ive eaten at every donair place. This place is single handedly number #1. The vine leafs are delicious.

So I drive here from surrey whenever I can, this food is cheap and delicious. They go above and beyond and listen to my nitpicking with what I like and do not want. If I do not want salad they give me extra chicken and rice free of charge. Very honest and kind people working here.

this place been the spot to eat anytime of the day. u hungry?? go check it!! really aint any other middle eastern donair style shops i go to but this one! dill rice, fresh salads, lamb shank is unreal. my go to is chicken plate with less rice and more serving of salad. EXTRA spicy with that finely chopped jalapeno!!
Best chicken donair in Vancouver HANDS DOWN
Amazing food. Big portions. I ordered the lamb shank and it was fall off the bone tender. Rice was well seasoned and the pasta was good too. Friendly people. Would come again
One of the best donair spots in Vancouver. Frat quality and always fresh tasting. Sauces are great, meat is great, service is friendly. My regular stop when looking for a donair.

GREAT staff working here, everytime we go here, they are super friendly and nice to us! Their prices are very affordable, great tasting donair. Place is small, so consider take out. The tabouli salad is delish!

Have tried this little gem twice now and both times food was amazing!  Very generous portions and the service was awesome.  Tiny little spot but I get take out for lunch.  Also the best part is that restaurant is super clean and its not messy at all.
Authentic donair. Very economical. The taste is just amazing! Loved the place. Although the seating is limited, the donair is one of the best that you can find in Vancouver. Highly recommended!

Damn, forget about other Donaire places. You come here regardless of your state, drunk, high, hungry, full. Its that damn good, just go now. Dont expect any washrooms ect and parking is atrocious, but it doesnt matter, just come.

I have to review seeing as I ate here too often. Personally I think the tastiest and best value food on the street. Even considering all the good value places to eat this side of town. Should be part of anyones staple diet.
My favorite Donair place in Vancouver. I ve tried dozens of other places and this one isn t beat on Quality or price
The best donair place ive ever been to!! Small but great for a quick bite! And the food is just amazing!!!
Love the donairs here. Very friendly and nice staff
Great taste and value. Very filling and loaded with meat. New favorite donair in downtown Vancouver.
Awesome food! Friendly fast service! I will come again when next in town.
MY GOD - the lamb shank plate that they sell is incredible, they sell sometimes over a hundred lamb shanks a day because it is so good. Do yourself and your endorphins a favor and try it.
Hadnt tried this place until today. Definitely a favourite now. Good meat, fresh salads, and great sauces.
The beef donair was delicious and SO BIG.
My favorite place for donairs, very flavorful theres a reason why they have been in business for so long while others keep going out of business.
When i was in Vancouver i loved your food , can u tell me how you make the honey garlic sauce ? I m from Saudi Arabia
Definitely great supporters of people
Awesome food, great taste, friendly workers, decent prices, filling and hearty, all around a 10 for sure !!!
I usually go to donair dude down the block, tried this place today and its so much better.... Definitely recommend!
One of my favourites, I tried most of similar restaurants that offer chicken wraps, but I keep coming back to this one.
Introduced to this place by a student whose family owns it. Love the sauciness and value of their donairs!   Mmm!
I always get the lamb shank plate, its really amazing.
Best donair in Vancouver. They are open late and I go here after drinking and its so satisfying. Its really affordable too!
Amazingly good food...the lamb donair and Tabouleh salad were yummy!!  I could eat here every day...
So good.
Delicious donairs in a prime location near Vancouver bar scene. Quick service, small eating area.
Best donair you ll have in town
Lovely place for donair and bonus points for being open till so late for the late night munchies . The Lamb shank is amazing
Nice Greek/ turkish halal restaurant in downtown Vancouver, tasty food fair price, recommended
This is a great quick bite if youre hungry and walking in the area
Fantastic Doner / Donair. Awesome, fresh ingredients and made to order Felafel. 5 Stars!
I have been coming to Donair Town for about 10 years now. This is the BEST Donair in Vancouver no doubt about it...and its super cheap!
Perfect spot for Donair!
The chicken donair was excellent! Lots of flavor!
One of the best donair in town top of my list
